channel.title: Our Research on Public Health England
channel.description: Recent content in Our Research on Public Health England

item.title: COVID-19
item.description: COVID-19 UKHSA has conducted over 150 research and surveillance studies, most in collaboration with academics, to better understand SARS CoV-2 virus and its transmission. We have published or submitted over 200 new research papers, commentaries and editorials on all aspects of the SARS CoV-2 virus, the illness it causes and how to mitigate the impacts of the pandemic. Below is one of many studies contributing to the scientific knowledge base for the virus.
